data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in Sheffield.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Arsenal.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
In the minute 7, Sheffield are caught offside.
Throw-in for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In the minute 9, Sheffield will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Arsenal.
Can Arsenal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
Can Arsenal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sheffield's half?
In the minute 12, Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Sheffield in the half of Arsenal.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a Sheffield throw-in in Arsenal's half.
In the minute 15, Goal kick for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Arsenal in London.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Arsenal close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Sheffield is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
In the minute 22, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sheffield awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sheffield needs to be cautious. Arsenal have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 25, Lee Stephen Mason awards Sheffield a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Arsenal.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Arsenal.
In the minute 29, Arsenal push upfield and Edward Nketiah gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Sheffield defence.
Free kick Arsenal.
Lee Stephen Mason awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, Sheffield have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
David McGoldrick for Sheffield gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
Sheffield to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
In London Arsenal drive forward through Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Sander Berge (Sheffield) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 39, The match at Emirates Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, who is down injured.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a throw-in for Arsenal, close to Sheffield's area.
In the minute 42, Arsenalâ€™s Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang is on his feet again at Emirates Stadium.
Sheffield have a goal kick.
Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang for Arsenal drives towards goal at Emirates Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Sheffield have a goal kick.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in London.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in London.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
Lee Stephen Mason awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 49, Lee Stephen Mason signals a throw-in for Arsenal, close to Sheffield's area.
Lee Stephen Mason awards Arsenal a goal kick.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a Arsenal throw-in in Sheffield's half.
In the minute 52, Arsenal's Dani Ceballos gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Goal kick for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Oliver McBurnie is replacing Oliver Burke for the away team.
Throw-in for Sheffield close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
In the minute 58, Mikel Arteta is making the team's first substitution at Emirates Stadium with Nicolas Pepe replacing Edward Nketiah.
Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
In the minute 61, Goal! A Bukayo Saka header gives Arsenal a 1-0 lead in London.
Hector Bellerin instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 63, John Fleck is on a sub for Ben Osborn for Sheffield.
Goal! Nicolas Pepe extends Arsenal's lead to 2-0.
Great play from Hector Bellerin to set up the goal.
In the minute 65, Oliver McBurnie for the away team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Arsenal in London.
Free kick Arsenal.
In the minute 76, Can Arsenal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sheffield's half?
The away team replace Chris Basham with Billy Sharp.
Oliver McBurnie gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sheffield.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
In the minute 81, Arsenal make their second substitution with Granit Xhaka replacing Dani Ceballos.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
David McGoldrick strikes to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 83, That's a fine assist from George Baldock.
Sheffield's Billy Sharp is whistled for offside at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 85, Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Arsenal make their third substitution with Ainsley Maitland-Niles replacing Bukayo Saka.
In the minute 88, Enda Stevens (Sheffield) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
Throw-in Sheffield.
Arsenal have a goal kick.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Arsenal.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sheffield are coming forward and John Lundstram gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Throw-in Sheffield.
Sheffield have a dangerous throw-in.
Sheffield's David McGoldrick gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Arsenal defender.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
Lee Stephen Mason blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
